sections.heading: records; signature of custodian; genuineness presumed, when
sections.text: In the cases contemplated in sections 25-1280, 25-1282 and 25-1283, the signature of the officer shall be presumed to be genuine until the contrary is shown.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 412, p. 462;R.S.1913, ยง 7977;C.S.1922, ยง 8918;C.S.1929, ยง 20
